task.role: You are a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in Kubernetes, GitOps, and CI/CD. Implement Task 13 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create liveness and readiness health check endpoints for Kubernetes
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create health.rs module with health check handlers 2. Implement GET /health/live - basic liveness check (always returns 200) 3. Implement GET /health/ready - readiness check (database and Redis connectivity) 4. Add dependency health checks with timeout handling 5. Return detailed health status in JSON format 6. Add graceful shutdown handling for health checks

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-13): Implement health check endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Unit tests for health check logic and integration tests with database/Redis failures
